title: Say your:
body:
Rank in LoL and are you proud???

I'm Bronze 3, kinda disappointed that i didn't get a higher rank, but I may have over estimated the power of bronze.
Failed my first series last night also to bronze 2

replies.body: Gold 5. Yup proud it's where I aim for so happy as a chappy.
plat 2, gold last season. quite pleased but would have wanted diamond

Well I'm silver 5 now which I'm not quite proud of but I made a lot of friends and I was in Bronze 4 last season so I guess I can't really complain and I have improved a lot in my support skills and I'm only 16 so I will improve as I get older.

P.S. I know this isn't like a physical sport but it is still a sport where you gain skills over time.

Diamond 4 and no I'm not proud at all. I've only moved up one division from last season and I would be a lot higher if I didn't tilt after reaching promos for Diamond 2 multiple times.  My goal this Season was at least Master but now I've just given up and am waiting for Challenger next season.
I'm Silver 3, started this season in Bronze 3 so im kinda proud of that, but at the same time i'm disappointed that i didnt get to gold this season, but i just don't enjoy  ranked at all.
